content.text:
Ready to go! I'm Claude Code, your file search specialist. I'm set up in read-only mode and ready to efficiently explore the codebase at `/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent`.

I can help you:
- Find files using glob patterns
- Search code with regex
- Read and analyze file contents
- Navigate the repository structure

The repo is currently on the `main` branch with several modified files across the desktop UI and Go backend packages. Just let me know what you'd like to search for or analyze!
